title.narrative: Manufacturing of EPS food packaging in Nigeria

description.narrative: Thermoware Particle Foam Machinery B.V. (Thermoware) specializes in the development and production of systems for the manufacturing of foam products. These production systems consist of the necessary machines as well as the moulds required for the production of foam products. The foam products are often used as packaging material in the food processing and pharmaceutical industry. In addition, Thermoware equipment can also be used to make parts that can be used in the construction or automotive sector.The Nigerian company Polystyrene Industries Ltd. produces high quality polystyrene panels for the construction industry in Nigeria. A few years ago, this company bought a second-hand R&D machine from Thermoware with which small volumes of drinking cups can be produced (pilot production) and with which Thermoware could also reach a different target group (supermarkets, fast food chains and the food processing industry). Now Polystyrene sees the demand for cups, trays and insulating (food) packaging increasing strongly in Nigeria and they see that the local food-producing companies often cannot supply supermarkets and fast-food chains because they cannot meet the requirements with regard to packaging. This is an opportunity for Polystyrene. In order to diversify and scale up and to produce packaging materials themselves, a complete production facility will have to be set up, which requires new machines and moulds. To this end, Polystyrene approached Thermoware and asked whether they could supply the technology / production lines.
